text:
Credit: Still Amicable

"With absolute love and respect, we decided to separate as a couple earlier this year," the former couple told Us Weekly in a joint statement on their breakup. "To give our family the best opportunity to adjust, we wanted to keep this a private matter before sharing it with the public. We are and will always be united in our support of each other and our family."
title: Josh Duhamel Steps Out Without Wedding Ring After Fergie Split News

meta_data.description: Josh Duhamel stepped out without wearing his wedding ring on Thursday, September 14, after announcing his split from Fergie — see the photos
